categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Selkath Padawan took part in the First Battle of Ruusan alongside another Selkath Padawan under a Cerean Jedi Master in the Army of Light. He or she was killed by Lord Kopecz's Force lightning, while the other was The duo was choked to death.
The sexes of both Padawans is unknown, though one was male. It is also unknown if they were the Padawans of the Cerean Master, or had just accompanied her.
